name: Beano
0:
”Alexa open beano”
”Alexa ask beano to tell me a joke”
”Alexa ask beano to play true or false”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beano
des:
WOAH! Beano is on Alexa! Just say ‘Open Beano’ to play the Ultimate True or False or listen to some of the Best Beano Jokes ever! All brought to you by the bonkers Beano hosts!

Beano True or False is the ULTIMATE True or False quiz, with loads of questions ranging from Slime to Star Wars! Stuffed full of sound effects and tricky trivia you just have to complete each round of five questions to find out your score! 

What does a sassy horse eat? Heyyyyyyyyyyy!!! If you LOL’d at that one check out the Beano skill for loads more…. we’ve got a bunch of the best jokes ever and got the brilliant Beano hosts to tell them! 

We’ve love to get your feedback about how we can make the Beano skill even more EPIC! So get in touch at hello@beano.com

Try Saying Things like;

Alexa, open Beano
Alexa, ask Beano for a joke 
Alexa, ask Beano to play True or False
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
